title: Crashing
body: Freezes during loading, bug splat at start, bug splat mid game, sometimes tells me I'm not connected to the internet and won't load. Idk wtf is going on. Started very recently out of the blue.

replies.body: Your drivers or something else is causing your game to not render properly and crash, which results in these bugsplats.  You'll want to start with the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  I highly recommend testing it out in a custom game, as getting a not connected error might be an additional problem to this.  Let me know how that pans out for you!
